website_summaries.verdict: This ozone-free air purifier has an Ultra-Quiet running mode and can purify up to 325 square feet.
pros: System includes 4 precut activated carbon pre-filters, as well as a true HEPA filter
Base removes to transform it from a tower into a tabletop unit
Filter lasts up to a year
cons: The fan can start to vibrate over time, creating quite a bit of noise
Replacement filters are expensive and hard to come by

customer_reviews.title: Replacement filter sets for this unit to be available at the end of June 2017
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to my previous review, and is about getting REPLACEMENT FILTERS for this new unit. I obtained the following information by emailing directly with the manufacturer: "Our replacement filters for this product will be available on Amazon at the end of this June. The VEVA 8000 has the lowest filter replacement cost of any True HEPA air purifier. A replacement set that includes 1 HEPA Filter and 4 Carbon Prefilters will cost around $19. They will be sold in a super value pack that will contain a total of two sets (2 HEPAs and 8 Carbon filters). I hope my answer helps!"
customer_reviews.author: RVSinOKC

customer_reviews.title: It does what was said!
customer_reviews.text: Well packed when received. Easy set up. The compact size fits any room.The weight is light to take to a different room. I started with the highest speed at the first day but changed to the medium speed after. Then I hardly noticed the machine was in the room. I opened the cover after 3-half-day use and found my dog's white hair was on the carbon Pre filter! I believe this purifier really filter out the particles in the air. I am glad that I brought two. I will give one to my son to use in his dorm.
customer_reviews.author: michael c.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have pets
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you have pets! Our home has a cat and a dog. Ever since purchasing and using the VEVA 8000 air purifier we have noticed a big decrease in odors. It has already done a great job of sucking up a bunch of pet hair. If you have pets and are looking for an air purifier this is a great choice. It has a sleek design and isn't in the way at all. I would highly recommend this to anyone who's a pet owner!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Wung

customer_reviews.title: Cleans 2nd hand cigarette smoke quite well
customer_reviews.text: My 23 year old son was very upset and complaining about 2nd hand smoke in his apartment where he had recently moved. I bought the VEVA 8000 Pro for him and it has worked beautifully. He has been using it for 2 months with no more complaints! I had read some of the other reviews so I wanted to add my own for people who may be concerned about smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PURIFIER
customer_reviews.text: The VEVA 8000 Elite is AMAZING!! We are temporarily staying with family that smokes in the house. After researching multiple purifiers and wanting to not spend a fortune I came across this one... Needless to say I could tell a difference in our room within an hour!!! Thank goodness for the 4 additional pre-filters this unit comes with as only weeks after receiving it, I have already had to replace the pre-filter. Only 1 recommendation for the manufacturer.... setting 3 needs to move more air.... :)
customer_reviews.author: Derick Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these Veva8000 units because of the coverage, price of the unit and the price of the replacement filters. So far, they installed easily and worked fine. Noise level was OK. I am skeptical of the claimed 325 sq. ft. coverage but have no way of telling if that is true. Dust level is low at my house right now so it is hard to tell. I hope it is true. I have measured the power consumption and found that the 3 speeds use 21/29/40 watts of power. Noise levels were 45/52/60 db measured 12 inches from the unit. Setup was easy, and the video at their website helps.
customer_reviews.author: RPL

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Company
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great, we have been in a smoke filled area of Oregon, it was a life saver, however first machine stopped working. Veva replaced it immediately. We did not have to return defective machine. They are wonderful people to do business with, in this day it is a heart warming pleasure to deal with people that stand behind their product and care about their customers. Vanessa is the best! Highly recommend Veva Air Purifier. Dr. & Mrs. Ken Castle Grants Pass, Oregon
customer_reviews.author: Liz Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4 units in January,
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 units in January, and all of them are rattling now to the point that they are too noisy and distracting to use
customer_reviews.author: R. Russell

customer_reviews.title: One of the best air purifiers I have ever seen!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, We have several pets and have terrible dust issues. Since getting this we have not had to dust our use canned air on my computer or other electronics. The air quality has improved quite a bit and it is very quiet. It was easy to set up and get started. I have gotten several other people to purchase them because of how great they work. It has saved me a lot of work and done wonders to protect my electronics and collectibles. Would wholeheartedly recommend this to anyone who needs a good air purifier.
customer_reviews.author: charles bazarian

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: I waited 6 months before writing my review as I had concerns after reading some of the prior customer reviews. This machine has been great. I have terrible allergies to dust and mold and would wake up with a headache almost daily. I was considering allergy shots. Since I purchased this machine and placed in my bedroom, I have had only a few headaches. Replacing the filter is easy and replacement filters aren’t expensive. The noise the machine generates is barely noticeable once you get used to it. I am very happy with this air purifier and have just ordered another!
customer_reviews.author: ruth a.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Effective Product
customer_reviews.text: This air purifier is wonderful. I've only had it a few days and I am very pleased. I live with a chain smoker and in a short time, it has practically eliminated the smell of cigarettes that permeated certain room of this house. I started it on the 3rd level, then the 2nd and now I keep it on the first level. It is wonderful. The smell of smoke has virtually been eliminated in a matter of days.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mero

customer_reviews.title: I doubt it works
customer_reviews.text: I gave this off brand product a chance but I doubt that it works. I own Honeywell brands purifiers that I know for sure works. I am working on returning the item
customer_reviews.author: 4dayo

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research and decided on the VEVA for couple of reasons....large Sq Ft coverage and lower priced replacement filters. I live in an apartment. Amazon reviews and Internet searches pointed to VEVA as a best buy. Very pleased with my purchase. Air quality is better. Helped a lot with cooking smells and smoke odors. I leave it on 24/7 using Hi speed when cooking then dropping back to low (low is almost silent but Hi is noticeable as expected). Had a small issue with my unit and the Customer Service from this Vendor handled it immediately...... they are excellent. Buy from them with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: frankv

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend due to waste of everyone time and money
customer_reviews.text: 1.they ship this product in no protection, and came open and all over the place 2. This is version vera 8000, i bought the additional hepa filter and carbon for filter vera 800..and they are not a match, 3. Would not recommend due to waste of everyone time and money
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Hubby put our unit together without reading directions. There were five extra parts left over when he finished. I read the instructions and found there was a video to help. Yes, we found out what the extra parts were for. I strongly advise viewing the video listed on the instructions before doing anything. The extras were for changing the unit from vertical to horizontal. We purchased this air purifier for allergy relief. The unit runs quietly during the night. I think it was a good purchase for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Acorn

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!! Cost Too Much To Stop Working!
customer_reviews.text: EDITED: When I first purchased this, it worked well, absolutely fantastic. I bought it for my sister. I have pet allergies and my sister has a big funky feet dog. His odor is awful! I couldn't smell the dog. BUT NOW, the frigging thing won’t even work. It makes a buzzing noise and you can forget anyone responding back to you. I have emailed several times, called a number which I’m not sure was the right number, and still no response. I can not recommend something that costs so much and not work a good year.
customer_reviews.author: E. D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Helps with dog dander
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely amazing! We got it for my husband's dog dander allergy and he feels so much better! It's very quiet and easy to use. Thank you all for creating an amazing quality product that doesn't break the bank like other ones on the market. This picture is the carbon prefilter after a month and a half next to a new one. Edited to add: this second photo is the main filter after 7 months next to a new one! Still absolutely love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Smoot

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Purifier
customer_reviews.text: As someone that lives in a basement room with pets, it was very hard for me and my animals to breath in the damp and dusty room. But after having this for a day the breathing problems are actually gone! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Its been good so far. I'm a bit weary due to the other reviews. I don't think it does much in the smell department but it seems to be filtering rooms okay. We have a cat now and we got it for our allergies. I've only had this for a short time so I will increase the rating in a few months if it is still functioning properly and I see that it makes a significant difference.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: I was sneezing and had a runny nose because of allergy season. Thanks to Covid, I work from home now and the allergies were starting to become a major problem. I bought one of these and after leaving it running for a day, I don't have any more issues with my allergies! I don't keep it running all the time. I find running it once a week is enough to clean out the allergens in my room.
customer_reviews.author: H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Very great product! Recommended for smokers or pet owners
customer_reviews.text: Been using this continuously for a good 3 months now. We smoke inside and have cats that shed a ton. It's very reliable so far. Catches any dust in the air, pet hair, dander, even harmful smoke produced from incense. We even smoke in a closed room and have this on full blast the whole time and overnight. The next morning, you don't even smell anything! Changing the filter is extremely easy to do. Comes with a carbon filter and 2 extras. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny J

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hoping it would work as good as the many reviews showed. When I recieved it I hooked it up, followed all the instructions and left it on for 12 hours with absolutely no dust or pet hair filtered from the air. Our home is very dusty and it should gave shown some evidence filtering the air. I unfortunately had to return it. No problem getting a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Debie L. Bodjanac

customer_reviews.title: Left everyone in Canada abandoned
customer_reviews.text: This filter is ok for the price. It is really just slightly larger than a desktop size. Not very quiet. Coway ap-1512HH is quieter on fan speed 2 than the Veva is on fan speed 1. And the Coway is approx 3 times the size and has approx 3 times the filter media. Biggest complaint I have? Veva will no longer sell replacement filters to anyone in Canada. So everyone in Canada who bought a unit from them, now have expensive paper weights. I contacted them directly but they still won't send any replacement filters up.
customer_reviews.author: paramed60

customer_reviews.title: So far happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased 2 VEVA 8000 Elite Pro . Have each set up in bedrooms. Set each on setting 2. Both are fairly quiet. We sleep with a floor fan running for the noise so the sound is no problem. Actually considering getting another for master bedroom. Main reason for getting an air purifier is household dust. Will update review in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Filters Please??
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good HEPA filter, however if replacement filters are not available, the unit is worthless. Might want to look at something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tina C.

customer_reviews.title: Useless without replacement filters, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Useless without replacement filters, don't buy. Not available on Amazon not on Veva website.
customer_reviews.author: Waddles

customer_reviews.title: My whole apartment smells more fresh!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this machine -- I cannot recommend it enough! We have a 1 bedroom apartment that we share with our kitty, who is a pretty fluffy little guy. I knew my allergies were picking up a little (it's shedding season) but I didn't know how much dust and fluff was in the air until I changed the filter for the first time. I changed it earlier than one would normally have to because this machine has been working super hard to clean our air, and I was impressed with how much it captured. We keep it in the bedroom, but the whole apartment smells more fresh since we got it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a well made purifier!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working well after the first 24 hours. Bought this for my mother who has COPD. Turned her office into a clean room. Her oxygen machine and refill station is in there with it. Easy to set up. It is quiet on all settings to me. Even turbo isn’t very loud. Much less so than say a fan that size. After first night the room already smells clean and fresh. Quite impressed so far. Will update over time. One negative was the bizarre packaging. About 1/3 of the box it came in had been hacked away. Then put in a larger box and shipped. Seemed to get here damage free and was sealed inside. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: PT-13Pilot

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING...........
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST thing ever...... I wish that they would send me a free one and then I would suggest them to ALL of my friends with pets (hint hint). This thing is AMAZING. I have a Rottweiler and my house is super clean but it seemed like no matter how much I cleaned I could still smell the dog... maybe my need to have everything in order, IDK but I walk into my house and it's sooooooo FRESH, I can actually smell my essential oils and not the dog. Thank you VEVA 8000 people that created this....and no they unfortunately have not given me a free one for a good review, it's really an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Rell

customer_reviews.title: Sleek yet heavy-duty air cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have my hopes high when I bought this but I have to say this thing is pretty awesome. I’ve had it since May 2019 and it’s pretty much ran on low nonstop ever since. With three cats and just finishing a renovation, this thing traps it all. The carbon filters are awesome and hold up for a while. It’s fairly slim and looks sleek so it hides nicely in the corner. Thinking about buying a second one for the cat box room.
customer_reviews.author: specvern03

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these purifiers for my bedroom, and unfortunately began having issues with it making squeaking and tapping sounds. I reached out to the customer service for VEVA, and was helped by Jackie. This company/brand has some of the best customer service I've ever experienced as of yet. They replaced the unit, without hesitation. Their products are also awesome quality and work great, besides the lemon I received the first time, but no company is exempt from defects occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Useless After Less Than One Year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this purifier last November. The filters are supposed to last 9-12 months, so I just went to order new ones. Turns out, the manufacturer has apparently stopped producing replacement filters. They are out on their website, and no one else has any in stock, rendering the purifier useless after less than a year. I contacted Amazon, and they refused to help, telling me I need to contact the manufacturer (which I already did). We paid way too much for this to last less than a year. I strongly urge you to find another one to meet your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Does A Good Job
customer_reviews.text: I have an old house which stays dusty. I also have a cockatoo and they put off a white powder that gets on everything. I bought this little sucker and put it in the bedroom and kept the bedroom door shut. The air quality was amazingly changed! The air smells sweet. There's no dust on all the furniture. Very pleased. Time to buy some new filters now! Was well worth the money. Even on high it's not even enough to be considered white noise. I sleep with a fan on and it's more quiet than the fan. I wake up in the mornings now and my head isn't all full and my throat isn't scratchy. Was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: seywhut

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and very easy to understand instructions, three speeds which make little if any noise at all. It has been performing well as I could expect so far and comes with three outer filters which attach to the inner filter.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Tee

customer_reviews.title: I have two and they work great.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 500 sqft apt and I have two of these going at all times. I keep them on the med setting and they create a low white noise hum that blends into the background. I do keep these on higher shelves to maximize the air circulation. I use an air blower on them every week and clean the filters (the cleaner the filter, the more quiet the purifier). I replace the charcoal filter about every other week. I love in LA near a busy street and I often have my balcony doors open so they keep the air in my apartment pretty clear. I love them and am so glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cinema4

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!  No replacement filters available
customer_reviews.text: Purifier worked great. When it came time to buy replacement filters, could not find any. Apparently an going problem if you read reviews here and on Veva website. Email received from Veva this morning says "We are currently having issues with the shipment of the replacement filters but rest assured that we do have stocks coming in. I just can't provide you with a exact date when. I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused." So the purifier is useless for now.
customer_reviews.author: Roshambo

customer_reviews.title: Showstopper low setting rattler.
customer_reviews.text: This could have been perfect. It's size and design was exactly what I wanted. Good looking, all black, no extra lights to fill your room with unwanted light at night. But I had to turn it, twice, because the unit on low rattled and made a very unpleasant noise on its lowest setting. If it would have been constant noise, I might have kept it. But both units had oscillating rattle noises on the setting. Not good enough for a $100 investment. Other than this one issue, everything else was incredible looking... But it was a showstopper for me.
customer_reviews.author: Am Buyer

customer_reviews.title: No more stale smoke and wet doggy smell!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a smoker and owner of both a dog and cat, my house has a tendency to smell... unpleasant. The VEVA 8000 Elite as remedied that situation however. I have it up and running in my living room and it has completely cleared up the stale smoke and wet doggy smell that often plagued my home. I’ve owned other air purifiers over the years but never one that so positively increased the air quality of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: If you know how to clean filters it works.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could upload a picture but I can not. TheIR are two different filters that go to this machine. One of them is located behind the filter. It catches the dust after the main filter. It does a great job. The second filter holds WAY more dust. Which shows how much it filter through out. I bought this to compare to the one my mother bought a few years ago that said it never needed to be changed. I know things need to be changed so please don’t think i fell victim to that. My mom did, I didn’t. But so far it works great! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: We did not open the box for awhile to try this out since we were in the middle of a move. When we finally unpacked, we opened it up and carefully put it together, as per the included instructions. Then, we plugged it in and turned it on, and it doesn't work! It looks perfect but nothing happens. Since we waited too long to try it out, now we can't return it! Horrible quality and very disappointing. and frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: good air purifier, non existant replacements
customer_reviews.text: Originally when I bought my filter, received great customer service. 1 year later, it sucks. We need filters, they're out for at least 2 months. Funny when they are still producing air filters but no replacement filters available. Tried contacting customer service for update, NADA. - Will update if there are every any more filters
customer_reviews.author: John le

customer_reviews.title: Improves The Air Quality, Happy it is 100% Ozone Free
customer_reviews.text: I was first attracted to this air purifier because it was ozone free. I did my research and found out that many other air purifiers with ionizers and uv lights actually create ozone. I wanted an air purifier that was HEPA only and came across this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Lu

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended purifier
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this air purifier. After 5 days of use in my master bedroom, I noticed a big difference in the air quality. Me and my wife have bad allergies due to dust and pollen. The veeva 8000 took care of all those issues. I can't believe how effective this purifier is!!! The air is so much cleaner and fresh in our room after only 5 days. I don't run the purifier during the day because we are at work. I run it from 6pm to 830am and it gets the job done. I will be ordering another for the family room for sure! I highly recommend this product for people who have allergies!!!! It truly works!
customer_reviews.author: Enzo

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Air Purifier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Air Purifier. We did our research before buying, and wanted something that would purify the air of our 200 sq ft bedroom. It definitely works fast and has three setting for fan speed. We like to keep it on the highest setting because the white noise it creates makes us feel like we're sleeping in a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: It's only been a few days since I received it but so far so good. Our house is normally pretty dusty and we're smack in the middle of a heavy pollen season here in metro Atlanta. Already I can tell a big difference in the air quality inside and I am not coughing and wheezing near as much. I may order another unit later as I have been rotating this one into different rooms for several hours at a time. We'll see how well it holds up to continuous operation for a few months. Nice that VEVA provides extra charcoal filters with the unit that should last a year. We'll see about that too.
customer_reviews.author: Ken W.

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and trim line of this filter
customer_reviews.text: I only gave the VEVA 8000 4 stars because I only started using it yesterday. I still need to know if the filter helps us with our allergies. But I very much like the look of this filter. It is nice looking; very trim, and fits nicely into the decor of our family room. It can easily be moved around from one location to another. After I have used it for a few months I will revisit my review. The price was great and would allow us to purchase additional units for our bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: CarolA

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. One of them I run for about 2-3 hours a day. I change the filter regularly. It died last month. The second one I run about 7 hours a day and it died today. Would not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Dog People

customer_reviews.title: Really works and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet when our on level 1. I use this instead of my kids waterfall sounds it’s the perfect white noise sound. I placed this in direct sunlight so I can see the dust go into it and it really worked on level 3 I saw all the dust go straight in! Definitely recommend! My allergies completely went away. I no longer need to blow my nose all night! I love that the replacement filters are actually affordable too!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a small area where someone smokes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air filter for a friend a month or two ago. I just visited him and his wife, who is not a smoker, and they are very happy with how it is working. He pulled the filter out after about 30 days and it was filthy. That tells me that this little machine is filtering very well. I also bought him an extra pack of filters so he would not have to search for replacements. I would recommend buying extra filters when you buy the unit, because they do fill up with contaminants very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tim in Frisco TX

customer_reviews.title: It's AMAZING for cigarette smoke!
customer_reviews.text: Finally an air cleaner that works for cigarette smoke! Ok so this doesn't have all the bells and whistles that some brands have. Just a button to turn off, on, 1, 2, and 3. On 3 it's quiet and within an hour of turning it on there was a definite difference in the air! The extra carbon filters are a plus too. Couldn't be more pleased with this purchase. Oh and this is an unsolicited review, I got nothing in return for my positive words other than clean air! LOL
customer_reviews.author: doxie lover

customer_reviews.title: The VEVA SAVED A LIFE
customer_reviews.text: My wife suffered everyday from headaches and allergies and from the first day of turning on the VEVA, her headaches and allergies disappeared!!! This is one good product that works fast. We followed the instructions and now live happily ever after in our home. Thanks for making such an excellent product at such an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rivera

customer_reviews.title: No smoke
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to use in the room he smokes his cigars in. We live in upstate NY so it is too cold to open windows and/or use an exhaust fan. So far this purifier is doing a wonderful job. It is removing all the smoke from the room and the smell is minimal. He can now enjoy his cigars without suffering the cold by having to open windows.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Freshko

customer_reviews.title: Vevo is a great buy, powerful blower and filters lasting up to a year, how can you say "no?"
customer_reviews.text: This is worth the price. I purchased a Germ Guardian Air Purifier a few years ago from Amazon and needed another for my living room. Both are the same price. The Veva cleans a large room compared to Germ Guardian's smaller room, also, the filters should last a year, Germ Guardian's-- one or two months, also, it's obvious, the intensity of the blower on Veva, even on medium speed is more powerful than Germ Guardian's. Today is the first morning I did not wake up clearing my throat for an hour. So far I am very happy with this purchase. It's a no brainer if you are contemplating between buying Germ Guardian vs Vevo. This is the better buy.
customer_reviews.author: A. ShertickTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Does its job...but a bit noisy
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 star if it's not because it makes considerable fan noise. But I like the compact size, and I live in the Mojave desert, it's extremely dusty and makes my chronic bronchitis worse, when it's turned on, I can feel the air is so much fresher and it makes it pleasant to breathe. Definitely notice a difference in the dust level when this "fan" is turned on. I would recommend this for the price and the small size compared to some other bulky one I purchased before.
customer_reviews.author: g3heavenlyfruit

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleek design but does not have a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sleek design but does not have a lot of intake venting. Only around sides of the front cover. This only works for a small room. I also have a Honeywell, which the whole front cover allows intake. I will stick with Honeywell in the future. Liked the slim design but lacks performance.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Has been a godsend
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be better. I set it up and let it run while I was a out for a few hours. When I came home, it was like I was breathing pure mountain air. I have a lot of trouble with allergies and especially itching eyes. It seems that having the air clear of pollutants has helped my eyes immensely. The purifier has been running continuously now for a week. On the low setting, which is a nice whisper of air. I may buy a second one to put exclusively in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: SallyM

customer_reviews.title: So simple, straight to the point
customer_reviews.text: I really like this air cleaner. Just a pair of filters, no fancy ultraviolet or weird ionizer, just clean air. It has several clever design features, like the magnetic cover and the velcro to attach the filters to each other. Simple to get up an working, practically self-explanatory. Looks very sleek and discreet, with no annoying (unnecessary!) lights. Best of all, it is so so so quiet. The white noise is low-pitched, easy to get used to for 24-7 use. I got it for the smoke in the pacific northwest, but now I'm thinking of getting more for elsewhere in the house. Very good value, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Lars

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE - Rattles after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great initially, but after 18 months the fan is rattling and squeaking. After 2 months of running on low, there is a noticeable reduction of dust in my office. Photo attached to show what is being filtered.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had some indicator for the air quality....
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don’t know how well this is working. I don’t like the fact that it doesn’t tell you the PPMs. I have had it on for 3 days straight now, and I can’t tell how well it is doing. I like that it is simple and all, but my other one (which is for a smaller room) tells me the PPMs, glows in three colors to let me know when it is at a dangerous level, etc. This one just sits there with the fan blowing. Nothing on the filter so far, so I’m a little lost.
customer_reviews.author: Sarz

customer_reviews.title: Not bad @ all.
customer_reviews.text: Had this purifier for 2 years, main reason bought it for constant cigar&cigarette smoke of neighbors, seeps alot thru old wood floor boards (apartments building) then for some allergens,cooking odors, helps with cigar/cigarette smoke, as for the rest it seems to do a decent job, use it mainly in winter since windows close,no fresh air, the CADR (clean air delivery rate)of purifier is 110-120, so even though it covers 325 ft. It may take couple of hours to purify air for certain particles. Overall a good purifier, does help with my problem of cigarette & cigar smoke.
customer_reviews.author: somewhatofa happyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. Really helps me sleep at night
customer_reviews.text: Really great machine. Works great. One suggestion though. Please make the HEPA filter available as a stand alone item. I am a smoker and the filter will have to be changed more frequently regardless of the charcoal filter. Annoying that I cannot buy a 4, 6, or 12 pack of HEPA Fliters so I always have one when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Khaddouma

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I believe this thing works because I just believe that it works. In all seriousness, it seems to be doing its job & getting rid of smells & feeling fresher air compared to the other rooms in the house. It’s been a little over a year of us using it & I’ll be ordering a pack of refill filters soon.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I’m truly surprised by how much this purifier has helped my allergies. I mean they aren’t 100% gone but they are vastly improved. I was having asthma like symptoms when I was home on the weekends that were getting worse and worse. I figured it had to be something in my apartment since it was always way worse when I was home more. Since I’ve had this thing I haven’t had the shortness of breath or wheezing at all. I would buy thus purifier over abs over again!
customer_reviews.author: Chameleon

customer_reviews.title: My Veva8000
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. So easy to use and the cost of refill HEPA filters and prefilters is very reasonable. Installation is a breeze. I have two now. My first one sits in my digital music studio where dust is a huge enemy to my equipment. I no longer need to cover any of my equipment and after a month hardly any dust at all. The other one is in our bedroom. Nice to breath clean air all night. As to the scent. I gave it a 1 because there isn't any scent, just clean air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I chose the VEVA 8000 Air purifier since it had good reviews and the price of replacement filters is reasonable. The best part is the charcoal filter that is placed over the Hepa filter that will make it last longer. Comes with one Hepa filter and 4 charcoal so the charcoal filter can be replaced 3 more times before replacing Hepa filter. Have only had it for 2 days but the room already smells fresh.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: A great for a smaller room/space.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a Dyson HEPA air purifier. I didn't want to spend the money. I decided to purchase this one. I'm so glad I did. With all the fires going on in the northern part of the state and the southern part of the adjoining state, the ash has been severe. Even the family cat is coughing. This not only cured the problem of a smoky room, but it also has a fan which has actually cooled off the room. We have no air conditioning, and can't open a window right now because of the smoke, so this product changed things for the better.
customer_reviews.author: _Selene_

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: I have copd and allergies during certain time of the year. I've had several air purifiers from other manufacturers but this is by far the worst! The air blows from back the filers are in the front with no openings for air flow so how does the air go thru and be purified? This doesn't do any of what it claims to. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! I was too fast throwing out the boxes to return.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Schanker

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: So yesterday 1/6/2019 i set 2 of these units up in the upstairs of my condo. There was so much dust floating in this condo that you could watch a light show at certain times of the day. Within 3 hours on the highest setting i can no longer even see any dust. This morning was the first morning in years that i woke up without having to clear a bucket load of mucus out of my throat. This filter does exactly what it says with quickness at that. The lowest setting is very nice and easy to sleep through.
customer_reviews.author: ethan

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy setup; not too loud
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the air purifier because I have dogs and wanted to have cleaner air for the grand children when they come to visit; so I can't comment on the effects of the air purifier because I did not have noticeable breathing issues. I can see it is working because after only two weeks, there was already a lot of dirt collected on the outer filter that I swept off. I also like that it comes with extra carbon filters, is easy to setup, and is not too loud. Working great as far as I can tell!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Quiet operation
customer_reviews.text: This unit is easy to handle and does not produce harmful elements. I like that it is quiet on the lowest setting but not too bad on higher settings. Based on other units I felt this one offered overall best value. I wish I knew how much electricity it uses. Manual says 40W but I don't know what that means. Like a 40W light bulb?
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Questionable build quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. First one worked right out the box. Second one had questionable quality control as the front panel wouldn’t slide into place and sounded like there was a screw bouncing around in there. Had to unscrew part of the panel and pull out a piece to make it work. Would’ve given a higher rating if the second unit didn’t come out the box with issues. Plastic feels cheap and flimsy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The item that arrived was not turning on at all ...
customer_reviews.text: The item that arrived was not turning on at all. I returned it and I am waiting to hear from amazon/customer service VEVA. The customer service at VEVA has been outstanding. The company really care about their customer. They resolved the issue, and as a result of their kindness and care, I bought another air purifier from them. The product itself, it is not excellent, but price/quality is very good. You can hear it at the lowest setting. Thank you Vanessa for your great service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VEVA 8000
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it, but love it so far. The unit is so quiet that when you set it at level 1 you have to put your hand at the back of the unit to feel the air to be sure it's on. At level 3, the highest, you can barely hear the unit running.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Arena

customer_reviews.title: Useless without the replacement filters
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice And effective machine but it’s disposable. Once you’ve used the filters that come with it you can throw it away. I bought mine in February 1919 and It has just been sitting there with no use because there are no replacement filters anywhere, not even in the company that manufactures the VIVA 8000.
customer_reviews.author: Nathifah

customer_reviews.title: That it's helping to clean our air especially due to allergies
customer_reviews.text: So far it's great. The air smells fresher and it's very quiet! It’s working great. There was a lot of dust in the pre-filter and I used a little hand vac to clean it off a few times but decided to change it after a month. It has lessened the dust in our bedroom a lot! We seem to be breathing a lot easier at night. I still move it to the kitchen/family room area in the daytime so it’s getting a workout. We do like it! Thank you for following up.
customer_reviews.author: CDM

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for only a couple of months but that included months where the air quality was poor due to heavy smoke particulates in the air as a result of the wildfires in the area. This purifier, on it's lowest setting, cleaned the air so well, I slept and breathed comfortably on nights I used it. We're moving into cooler months so I may not have the need to use it as often but I'm feeling pretty confident that this unit will continue to provide such great results!
customer_reviews.author: nenheedra

customer_reviews.title: Where have I been for last 37 years?
customer_reviews.text: This is my first air purifier ever. Its placed in an open floor plan living room that's adjacent to the kitchen. Approximately 600 sq ft area. I am VERY pleased with this machine. It purifies any kitchen smells, cooking, and smoke (deep fryer). Worth every penny. I also moved it to my bedroom for a few nights, setting 1 or 2 is very soothing to sleep to. Like a whitenoise machine. I will be buying another one for upstairs very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Should have watched when I got the product!
customer_reviews.text: I did not watch the video when we got them. Found the replacement filters in a drawer and decided to change them. On the back of the purifiers is a sticker telling of the website and video so I watched it. I found that I had waited waaaay toooooo loooong to check and service it! I also found from the filth inside that they are really working! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jerrie Boos

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described in the posting. I have had the purifier for a couple of weeks now and it has been running non-stop since removing it from the box. I have had no problems or concerns with this product and it does remove a lot of small particulate from the air as is evidenced by the dust and small particles on the outer charcoal filter. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT AIR FILTER
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT air filter. I could tell the difference In Air quality after only 2 hours. After 3 days on the medium setting, I checked out the carbon filter and it has already collected a good amount of dust, definitely a good sign because my air quality is improving. I live on the beach, and it’s quite windy which brings sand dust, pollen, and other allergens into my living room. I bought another air filter by ‘VAVA’ for my bedroom, and it left a plastic smell in there. I’m returning that one and buying another one of these. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyMig

customer_reviews.title: Great air purifier!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's bedroom to help eliminate any particles in the air that might inhibit her breathing at night. We have a Dyson air purifier running in another bedroom, so the overall air quality in the house is actually quite good considering we have 2 cats. But so far this air purifier seems to work well with good air movement and just the right amount of noise.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Gill

customer_reviews.title: Works great, has a 3 prong plug FYI
customer_reviews.text: Works well in my house, three settings are as described. The air coming out is also fan level speed at setting three which is nice. This does have a 3 prong plug, just wanted to point that out.
customer_reviews.author: incognito

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I definitely made the best choice!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our new VEVA 8000. Delivery was super quick which is never normal for Alaska. This machine has given us a completely new and clear atmosphere in our home. I ordered this HEPA filter after our family experienced a terrible round of colds that we couldn’t seem to get rid of. The quality of our homes air wasn’t good, we could see a lot of dust in the sun rays shining through the windows. After half a day of using this machine, the dust started to show on the carbon pre-filter. A little over a week later, that filter looks disgusting and everyone is feeling much better! I definitely recommend this machine to all!

customer_reviews.title: THIS REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: My 8yo son has a severe dust allergy, and we have been through several air purifiers in his bedroom to try and mitigate reactions. This is the first and only one to actually control dust! We have a rigorous vacuuming/cleaning regimen in his bedroom to begin with, but with other air purifiers, there would always be a layer of dust on the baseboards, heaters, furniture, etc. With this air purifier, there is very little dust that settles in on furniture and fixtures + my son's nighttime congestion has all but disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: jjjack

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I’m honestly really impressed by this little unit! I didn’t know what to expect, but it has made a noticeable change in the air quality of my apartment, which is a huge deal during this yucky quarantine!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Has drastically reduced my allergy symptoms!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Super easy to setup and has really improved the air quality of my room. I had no idea an air purifier could help my allergies as much as this one has! It would be nice if it had the same impact but a smaller size. Also I would prefer either no white noise or the ability to somehow change the sound? But really those are nit-picky things. Super happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Live with a smoker in a 700 sq ft apt. Have the VEVA in the kitchen/living room and a small Honeywell non HEPA air purifier in the bedroom. Since using the VEVA for a week, apt. smells much better! I run the VEVA on the highest fan speed and it's not that loud. Will likely be buying a second VEVA for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dalton

customer_reviews.title: No more stink
customer_reviews.text: Like most people I was concerned about the noise level, I should not have worried because this is very quiet. It has three levels of speed. When it's at level one you can not even tell it's on. I had somebody smoked up a storm in my house and put it on three we left for about an hour when we came in there was no trace of odor. Might have a little dog and all of her little beautiful little smells have disappeared as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air purifier for my office because I work in an old building that I’m positive contains mold. I was chronically sick. So far in the past two months I noticed that o could breathe again. However, when I went to put the front back on, it wouldn’t click back into place. It is now being held together with tape. It is past the 30 day mark and Amazon is fighting with me about the return. I gave this a low rating because I don’t have time to fight with this machine and try not to be sick, and work my butt off at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, efficient and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I’m not savvy when it comes to setting up anything especially anything that plugs into a wall. This was easy to set up right from the box. I looked up the video and bam! Done! I have this set up in my bedroom and it’s noticeably cleaner air and the #2 setting puts me to sleep. I looked at air purifiers to purchase for weeks and so glad I found this one!
customer_reviews.author: PajamaPrincess

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: The Veva completely stopped working 1 day after the return window closed. Now what do I do with it?
customer_reviews.author: Researcher1

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with all the filters shown. Machine itself is cheap feeling. I've had it going for 2 weeks now and the white filter is perfectly clean like its not doing anything ! And the fan has already started making squeeky noices after just 2 weeks!! Waste of $100 😭
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I have asthma and was having issues sleeping until I bought this. This has been a lifesaver!! It doesn't have a chemical smell, isn't too big, and isn't so loud that I can't sleep through the night. The filter has already caught a lot of things in the area from my 3 dogs and Guinea pig. Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Millzr

customer_reviews.title: Save your $$$
customer_reviews.text: Worked great fro a few days...Now it is so noisy you don't want to stay in the same room with it
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Huse

customer_reviews.title: Rattling motor not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with rattle noise in the motor when running on level 1 or 2. I need service support VEVA or amazon ?
customer_reviews.author: Live2Fish

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Mild allergies and two dogs just don't mix so I purchased this unit to purify the air. About an hour after I turned it on, I was breathing better already! This unit is very quiet. I cannot hear it at all on the first setting which is what I use unless my dogs are playing a lot, then I turn it up to second setting (which is pretty quiet also). I would recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Gail D

customer_reviews.title: Catches the dust and allergens in the house
customer_reviews.text: This air purifier works! Didn’t take more than a couple of days during pollen season to find this catching a lot of dust and allergens in the house! Very happy with this purchase, will be getting another one for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I decided to set up a allergy hepa filter this fall because a fellow worker mentioned that I have been clearing my throat and coughing for years. Always though I was just catching something but could keep illness at bay. Her comment that she wondered if I should go to the doctor hit me. I purchased this unit for family,room, then a small air purifier for my office and bedroom. Also a top of the line filter for my furnace. All together they all have really changed my life. I don’t like taking medications and this helped significantly.
customer_reviews.author: CYR

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service!  Outstanding Product!
customer_reviews.text: I do appreciate the high level of customer service your company provides. I am completely satisfied with the VEVA 8000 air purifier. I have it placed in a room where the cats litter box is located and without a doubt the air quality has significantly been improved both in freshness and in the level of dust. Actually I am quite impressed with the overall reduction in litter dust. This air purifier has exceeded my expectations. Thank you for the excellent product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Austin M.

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for 2 months for my wife's allergies. It has dramatically improved her breathing at night. We keep it on the lowest setting otherwise it's a tad bit noisy for sleeping. Very easy to use. Great deal would recommend this to anyone who wants a quality air filter without spending too much.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Z

product_meta.title: VEVA 8000 Elite Pro Series Air Purifier HEPA Filter & 4 Premium Activated Carbon Pre Filters Removes Allergens, Smoke, Dust, Pet Dander & Odor Complete Tower Air Cleaner Home & Office, 325 Sq Ft.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY - HEPA filter captures dust and allergens as tiny as .3 microns to remove household dust, pet dander, mold spores, pollen, bacteria, germs and PM2.5 particles. Ideal for anyone who suffers from allergies and asthma or looking to create a cleaner healthier home. This product comes with a 2-year registered warranty and lifetime support from VEVA.
ELIMINATE ODORS - Premium activated carbon pre-filters remove odors from pets, smoking, cooking and more. Use activated charcoal nano-technology to provide fresh clean air throughout a large room.

SUPERIOR VALUE - This complete air cleaner system includes a HEPA Filter along with 4 Precut Activated Carbon Pre-Filters. This complete set eliminates the need to cut, clean or vacuum pre-filters and extends the life of the main HEPA filter. The VEVA 8000 offers the most affordable HEPA replacement filters of any air purifier. It also has the longest lasting filters on the market that only need to be changed every 6-12 months depending on usage.

PERFECT FOR HOME OR OFFICE - The VEVA 8000 features an innovative and sleek design that guarantees the air purifier to be the perfect addition to any home or office. It can be changed from a tower air purifier to a table-top air purifier by removing the base. 3-Stage Fan Speed ranges from Ultra Quiet to Turbo. Measures 9" x 8" x 23".

SAFE FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY - 100% Ozone free, does not use UV or Ions which produce trace amounts of measurable ozone, a harmful air pollutant. ETL Certified and tested by Nationally Recognized Testing Laboratories to UL Standard. Has an automatic shut-off safety feature when the front panel is removed, making it safe for homes with a baby, cat or dog.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,827 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Air purifier, 1 HEPA Filter, 4 Activated Carbon Pre-Filters, 1 Detachabel Base
